a cross-section from 1987

observation :  individuals
country :  United States
title: Wife Working Hours
reference: Lee, Myoung–Jae (1995) “Semi–parametric estimation of simultaneous equations with limited dependent variables : a case study of female labour supply”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 10(2), April–June, 187–200.
